pilithuru- palamuwenma kiwa yuththe nirnamika liyumak labunu pamanin obe samiya pilibanda sakayak athi karagatha yuthu nowana bawayi.manda yath atham wita obage ho samiyage tharahakarayeku wisin obalage pawul jiwithaya kadakappal kirime aramunen mese liyumak ewannatada idakada pawathina bawini.anek athata obe daruwata wenaskam siduwana bawatada obata aaranchi labi athi bawa kiwada eya wishwasadayi aaranchi margayakda yanna thahawuru nowe.ewani karunak thahawuru kara ganimata pramanawath thorathuru oba ewu lipiye sandahan nowe.kese wethath awasana washayenda pawasiya yuththe nirnamika liyumak matha padanam wi anawashya biyak sithata athikara gatha yuthu nowana bawayi.ese wuwada wada wishwasadayi gnyathin ha hithamithurangen thorathuru dana ganima wada hondaya.

palamu test tharagaya dilli nuwara pawathi athara palamu inimedima walkot (152) goms (101) wiks (128) kristini (107) shathaka laba ganimin mulu lakunu sankhyawa 631 dakwa ihala damimata samath wuna. 1950-60 dashakaya indiyawata wasanawa gena dena dashakayak wiyaga palamu test tharagayaka jaya wartha kirimathla eya engalantha kandayamata erehiwimath wishesha ithihasa gathawana siddhiyak wiya.
